website_summaries.verdict: The Philips Flex works OK for casual listening at midlevel volumes, but your dollar can go further with other models that sound much better.
pros: The weather-resistant Philips Flex Bluetooth speaker can hold a charge for 12 hours of playback at moderate volumes and has an integrated lanyard loop for hanging it off a belt loop or a backpack
cons: The expanding radiators don't do much to improve the mediocre sound quality of the Flex
It also lacks dedicated volume control buttons, which can prove a hassle when the music source is distanced from the speaker

customer_reviews.title: Volume does not work
customer_reviews.text: Good product, good sound for the money, fast Bluetooth connection. But, after just couple of weeks unable to control the volume by using a cell or a tablet. It jump from 0 to 100 in one click and nothing in a middle. It looks like a defective Bluetooth.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good but not too loud.
customer_reviews.text: I liked the first one I bought soo much I bought a second one. The speaker is nothing fancy but it works great. I have neighbors upstairs and try to be considerate of them. The product connects to my phone quickly and I can enjoy listen to music without being too loud. It takes about 4 hours to charge. I bought a second unit so I can continue listening to music while the other unit is charging. I recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Steven Smith

customer_reviews.title: Good speaker
customer_reviews.text: Good sound nice pop up and collapse. Like rubber durable coating. I don't use frequently so don't know how holds up for heavy user. However I have had other cheap speakers which fall apart quickly but this one good so far. Has slot for cord /clip to hang, good feature
customer_reviews.author: Jb

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful device
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my daughter and her IPOD full of music. She loves the design, color and pop out speakers. The quality of the sound is pretty good given the price and size. Sync'd first time we tried to her IPOD. No hesitation in recommending this to others. Again, the quality may not satisfy a sound guru listening to orchestral recordings, but for pop music it works great.
customer_reviews.author: travelerofnj

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Inexpensive speaker makes 10+times volume of your phone speakers. Sounds decent but not for the music fanatic. I use it when working outside or in on projects so can hear and phone stays safely in my pocket. Used while in hot tub as well.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: I bought it for my Mac Book pro because the ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for my Mac Book pro because the originals speaker are very low. I was very surprise how loud they go for the price I paid, very convenient for a picnic or in the shower, while cooking. Worth it !!
customer_reviews.author: Marcus

customer_reviews.title: Quality/battery life/good stuff
customer_reviews.text: Seriously, this little speaker performs beyond expectations , had it for over a year and continually outlasts my drinking binges! Worth every penny and more. Its not the best sounding speaker, but for the money, its the best you can get! No joke...buy it now!!! Seriously, and I never write reviews, buy it!!
customer_reviews.author: Robert R.

customer_reviews.title: His friends love it. Uses it all the time
customer_reviews.text: Nephew loves it. His friends love it. Uses it all the time. (its always in the middle of their board games)
customer_reviews.author: Christian D.

customer_reviews.title: One is the loneliest number
customer_reviews.text: Ordered two expecting to be able to place in different parts of the home but since both have the same name, does not allow Bluetooth to sync both at the same time so returned one.
customer_reviews.author: Sue

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love this new speaker! Bluetooth works great and will be awesome in my classroom!
customer_reviews.author: Pamela L. Jimison

customer_reviews.title: Good and cheap
customer_reviews.text: Not bad, loud. Louder when closed. Battery life not 12 hours though
customer_reviews.author: Steven

customer_reviews.title: Fake?
customer_reviews.text: I think this was a fake product. It was poorly made and broke immediately.
customer_reviews.author: courtney campbell

customer_reviews.title: Very Handy little speaker. For small spaces.
customer_reviews.text: Works great, with AUX cable or via Bluetooth. When the speaker is expanded, it sounds less tinny than when not expanded. Loads better than any smartphone speaker. But no competition for pricier alternatives, such as the UE Roll, Cambridge Oontz. So this will definitely satisfy you if all you are looking for is to amp up the sound from your smartphone speaker a little. Nothing more.
customer_reviews.author: Suresh Kumar

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed in the sound and there are no volume controls.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Faultiung Pairing
customer_reviews.text: After about a dozen uses, the pairing to Bluetooth no longer works
customer_reviews.author: Equinus2

customer_reviews.title: Worthless
customer_reviews.text: It lasted 3 uses and stopped working! I'm trying to find the box so I can send it back. I bought it for a beach trip I'm now on and it's still sitting in my suitcase. I had it working on 2 separate devices (IPod and my IPad) for 3 test runs before I left home, had no problems, and now it won't connect with either device. I've completely charged it, tried it at least 10 times on both of the same devices and it won't pair up anymore. Hey Amazon, will you take it back and refund my money?
customer_reviews.author: Mel J. Thillens

customer_reviews.title: The speaker itself works fine.
customer_reviews.text: The package was wrapped and broken when delivered, hard to believe it as a 'new' item. The speaker itself works fine.
customer_reviews.author: Yufeng Song

customer_reviews.title: The best portable compact speaker !!
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the multiple portable speakers I have owned over the years, and it is by far (for speaker that I travel with) the best I have ever used. It is lightweight, collapses to a compact size has GREAT bass sound, and will transmit low frequencies to a table or the bottom of a drawer in a chest (accentuates the sound and the bass). It is easy to pair, with GREAT sound.
customer_reviews.author: UncleBob

customer_reviews.title: What do you expect from this?
customer_reviews.text: Your opinion of this will depend on your expectations. For the price, for the size, I think it's fantastic. I did not expect much, but it's fairly loud, crisp and has good sound quality. The bluetooth capabilities work well with my iPhone 6S. I use it when working around the house I can listen to podcasts and occasionally use it when streaming video on my phone. If, however, you are expecting high sound quality with thumping bass, then you will be disappointed. But you shouldn't expect that, because it stands about 4 inches tall and costs around $20.
customer_reviews.author: R. McAtee

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Perfect little speaker. I needed a speaker I could use while getting ready or taking a shower. Bluetooth works great. It's actually pretty loud for its small size, I don't need to turn it up full blast to be bumpin. Voices are clear, bass is surprisingly good for its size. I like how it folds and the strap is actually really convenient. Holds a charge forever. I live this little thing
customer_reviews.author: C

customer_reviews.title: Great sound from a small speaker
customer_reviews.text: This was my first experience with a wireless bluetooth speaker and I had my doubts that such a small speaker could produce good sound. I was wrong. This speaker is pretty good. I used it with my smart phone to watch videos on You Tube and the sound was great. And by expanding the speakers you increase the bass. I am really impressed and would recommend this for anyone with limited space or for using on long trips. And tge 12 hour battery life is great too.
customer_reviews.author: J. Tidline

customer_reviews.title: OK for kids
customer_reviews.text: This speaker is just ok. I am not super impressed with it. It is nice that it collapses into itself when not being used but the speaker quality isn't that great. The overall sound is sub par to say the least. If you are buying this for a kid I would say no problem they will not even notice the quality, but an adult who enjoys music will definitely be able to tell that this speaker is not of high quality.
customer_reviews.author: Maggie

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: I cannot seem to make it work with my go phone
customer_reviews.author: Big_Joe

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: not much to say, it was for my grandson and he likes it
customer_reviews.author: Jacquelyn Danielson

customer_reviews.title: Great sound.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a gift for my husband and he loves it. Great sound.
customer_reviews.author: Paulette Thompson

product_meta.title: Philips FLEX BT2000B/37 Bluetooth Wireless Portable Speaker (Black/White)
product_meta.description: Color:Black/whiteBring music to your adventures with a compact, rugged and easily carried speaker that can be strapped to any bag. Anti-clip technology gives better sound for its size. When you want more just pull it open. Music lasts for half day.
feature_bullets: Anti-clipping function for loud, distortion free music
Pull out the speaker for better quality sound
Built-in rechargeable battery for music playback anywhere

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.9 out of 5 stars67 ratings3.9 out of 5 stars
